name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.namenode.snapshot.skiplist.max.levels
description:
Maximum no of the skip levels to be maintained in the skip list for
    storing directory snapshot diffs. By default, it is set to 0 and a linear
    list will be used to store the directory snapshot diffs.

name: hadoop.caller.context.signature.max.size
description:
The caller's signature (optional) is for offline validation. If the
      signature exceeds the maximum allowed bytes in server, the caller context
      will be abandoned, in which case the caller context will not be recorded
      in audit logs.

name: dfs.block.misreplication.processing.limit
description: Maximum number of blocks to process for initializing replication queues.

name: ha.failover-controller.graceful-fence.connection.retries
description: FC connection retries for graceful fencing

name: hadoop.security.groups.cache.secs
description:
This is the config controlling the validity of the entries in the cache
    containing the user->group mapping. When this duration has expired,
    then the implementation of the group mapping provider is invoked to get
    the groups of the user and then cached back.

name: dfs.client.hedged.read.threshold.millis
description:
Configure 'hedged' reads in DFSClient. This is the number of milliseconds
    to wait before starting up a 'hedged' read.

name: dfs.ha.tail-edits.namenode-retries
description: Number of retries to use when contacting the namenode when tailing the log.
